title: Coding Quiz
summary: Coding quiz that allows you to test your knowledge of different languages and concepts

title: Eat Da Burger
summary: Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.

title: Fitness Tracker
summary: An app using Heroku that allows a consumer to reach their fitness goals by tracking their workout progress.

title: Work Scheduler
summary: A work scheduler that allows you to make notes throughout the day.

title: Password Generator
summary: A password generator that allows users to create custom passwords of their preference.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: Weather dashboard that allows you to find the weather of certain areas over a five day forecast.
